job_tasks.phrase: create highly realistic, emotional and life-like synthetic humans through text-to-video.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core research and development goal, which involves creating generative models for a specific output (synthetic humans via text-to-video).

job_tasks.phrase: helping with the research and development of our generative avatar performance abilities.
job_tasks.justification: Directly states R&D for generative capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: create models that guides the avatar's verbal and non verbal cues.
job_tasks.justification: Describes the task of building models that generate specific outputs (avatar cues) based on conditioning signals.

job_tasks.phrase: create high quality, production ready code
job_tasks.justification: Building production-ready code falls under traditional software development.
Ownership of production pipelines is a key aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Building libraries to accelerate the iteration speed during development (abstracting common functionality, automating tests sweeps, visualising results etc.).
job_tasks.justification: These are classic software engineering tasks aimed at improving development efficiency.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing, maintaining and deploying Computer Vision algorithms and models to update our product
job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining models is a core task in model development.
Integrating CI/CD is a fundamental MLOps practice for deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment.
job_tasks.justification: This covers the end-to-end process, with a strong emphasis on deployment and operational aspects of the ML lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product.
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating existing tools/models into the product, a software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to a high-quality codebase, develop tests where necessary, and participate in code reviews.
job_tasks.justification: These are fundamental software engineering practices focused on code quality and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Writing clean and efficient code, and defining best practices both in the code base you own and in adoption of the tools you build.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on code quality and establishing engineering standards, which are software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This bridges R&D with production readiness, focusing on the engineering aspect of making solutions work in a deployed environment.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world.
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes building production-ready software and a broad engineering scope.

soft_skills.phrase: passion for working on cutting edge problems
Contribute to a high-quality codebase, develop tests where necessary, and participate in code reviews.
defining best practices both in the code base you own and in adoption of the tools you build.
Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions.
our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product

profile.rationale: The job description details a significant number of tasks related to core software engineering (building libraries, production code, CI/CD, full ML lifecycle ownership, optimizing for deployment, full stack work) and also tasks related to generative AI model development (creating text-to-video models, guiding avatar performance, adapting off-the-shelf solutions). This balance between building and deploying software systems and developing specific generative AI models, with a clear focus on GenAI capabilities, aligns with the Core GenAI Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities, explicitly mentioning both the AI/ML development aspects (generative models, text-to-video) and the software engineering/MLOps aspects (production code, pipelines, CI/CD, full lifecycle). The tasks map cleanly to the defined categories, making the profile assignment straightforward.
